longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of Hungary traveling without a passport must have
  a document accepted for entry, valid on arrival. 
- Nationals of Hungary are allowed to enter with an expired
  normal passport or an expired national ID cards. These
  documents are accepted when expired for a maximum of 1 year.
  
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card:
 - issued to nationals of Hungary.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Hungary will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Hungary are expected to hold
  their own travel document
